title: Deloitte Top 200: Chief financial officer of the year - a2 Milk’s David Muscat
description: David Muscat led a2 Milk through three major deals to reshape its operations.
content: A2 is a very complex organisation in terms of the markets that we play in, but if you step back, we have a very clear strategy that David [chief executive David Bortolussi] and the team refreshed in … [+10778 chars]
